title: Man receives his college degree hours before dying of pancreatic cancer
text: J: There’s More! Ukraine Whistleblower’s Lead Attorney Donated to Joe Biden’s Presidential Campaign by Cristina Laila. As previously reported, the Deep State “whistleblower” who spoke out on President Trump’s call to the Ukrainian President in July, but who was not on the call, hired a former Schumer and Hillary Clinton staffer, Andrew Bakaj to represent him/her. Attorney Andrew Bakaj is representing an anonymous client who filed a whistleblower complaint based on rumors. A Deep State ‘whistleblower’ penned a complaint based on rumors that Trump threatened to withhold hundreds of millions of dollars in aid from Ukraine unless the Ukrainian government agreed to investigate Joe Biden’s son Hunter for his involvement with Burisma Holdings, a Ukrainian natural gas company. The Trump-Zelensky transcript was declassified and the full, unredacted 5-page transcript was released Wednesday morning showing there was no quid pro quo and no threats. There’s more! Andrew Bakaj also donated to Joe Biden’s presidential campaign earlier this year — imagine our shock. Via the Free Beacon: The lead counsel representing the Ukraine whistleblower donated to Joe Biden’s presidential campaign earlier this year, records show. Andrew Bakaj, founder and managing partner of D.C.-based law firm Compass Rose Legal Group, is the lead counsel working on behalf of the Ukraine whistleblower. Bakaj earmarked a $100 donation on April 26 through ActBlue, a fundraising nonprofit that helps facilitate contributions for Democrats, to Biden’s presidential campaign, the Federal Election Commission’s website shows. Biden appears to be the only recipient of campaign cash from Bakaj this year.
description: This man was diagnosed with an aggressive cancer and became unable to finish his final class -- then the school system did something incredibly touching
